hypothesis: If we reduce the friction of planning outdoor activities to a single tap, more people will actually go outside on weekends.
learnings: Push notifications at 6pm Friday convert 3x better than morning sends. People don't lack motivation â€” they lack a nudge at the right moment.

hypothesis: Surfers check 4 different apps every morning. One SMS with the verdict would save 15 minutes and reduce decision fatigue.

tagline: A browser extension that blocks everything for one hour
hypothesis: Forcing a daily offline hour would improve self-reported wellbeing scores over 30 days.
learnings: Built the MVP but realized the Chrome Web Store review process would delay launch by weeks. Paused to focus on Nature Club instead. Might revisit as a mobile app.

tagline: Markdown trail journals with GPS embeds
hypothesis: Hikers want a dead-simple way to journal trails without leaving the terminal.
learnings: Too niche. The 12 people who loved it REALLY loved it, but couldn't find a growth channel. Good tech, wrong market.
